    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    AdminController(Class): Controller class for the admin dropdown menu and initializer for viewRevenue Contains methods to initialize the view, pull payment data from file, print it to the TextArea, and scene switches for most of the admin side .
    AdminIssuesController
    AdminIssuesController(Class): Controller class for the admin issues view.
    AdminManageStaffController
    AdminManageStaffController(Class): Controller class for the admin manage staff view.
    AdminManageStaffDetailsController
    AdminManageStaffDetailsController(Class): Controller class for the admin manage staff details view.
    AdminRoomDetailsController
    AdminRoomDetailsController(Class): Controller class for the admin room details view.
    AdminRoomsController
    AdminRoomsController(Class): Controller class for the admin rooms view.
    AdminViewAccountController
    AdminViewAccountController(Class): Controller class for the admin view account view.
    AdminViewAccountDetailsController
    AdminViewAccountDetailsController(Class): Controller class for the admin view account view.
    App
    JavaFX App
    CreateAccountController
    CreateAccountController(Class): Controller class for the create account view.
    Hotel
    Class: Hotel Date: November 20, 2025 Programmers: Mahfuz Ahmed, Michael Garcia Description: This is the main implementation class for the hotel management system.
    HotelSystem
    Interface: HotelSystem Date: November 20, 2025 Programmers: Mahfuz Ahmed, Michael Garcia Description: This interface defines the methods for the Hotel management system operations.
    LandingPageController
    LandingPageController(Class): Controller class for the landing page view.
    LoginController
    LoginController(Class): Controller class for the login view.
    PrimaryController
    PrimaryController(Class): Controller class for primary.
    ReportIssueController
    Controller for the Report Issue feature.
    Room
    Class: Room Date: November 21, 2025 Programmer: Michael Garcia, Mahfuz Ahmed Description: Establishes the status of rooms in the hotel which can display as available or reserved.
    RoomOptions
    Class Name: RoomOptions Date of Code: November 20, 2025 Programmer: Michael Garcia, Mahfuz Ahmed Description: Hotel has a set number of floors and rooms per floor The different room options that are shown via an array list taken from a text file whiich is read and written to.
    SecondaryController
    SecondaryController(Class): Controller class for secondary.
    UserMenuController
    UserMenuController(Class): Controller class for the user dropdown menu.
    UserRentRoomController
    Controller that loads and displays available rooms for users.
    UserUpdateInfoController
    Controller that allows a user to update their account information.
    ViewMyRoomsController
    Controller for displaying the rooms reserved by a specific user.
